definitions: the action of tearing or cutting something into shreds

examples.text: we are in the process of piling leaves for future shredding

shortDefinitions: action of tearing something into shreds

definitions: the process of reducing documents into unreadable strips by feeding them into a shredder

examples.text: the mass shredding of documents could jeopardize the work

shortDefinitions: process of reducing documents into unreadable stripsr

definitions: a very fast, intricate style of rock lead guitar

examples.text: we want to hear everything from country and western to blisteringly fast guitar shredding

shortDefinitions: very fast, intricate style of rock lead guitar
